synopsis:
Four best friends live life to the fullest when they
embark on a wild trip to see their hero, Tom Brady,
play in the 2017 Super Bowl.
title: 80 for Brady
casting: Lily Tomlin, Jane Fonda, Rita Moreno, Sally Field

synopsis:
While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl
and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who
demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse.
Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world,
the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.
title: Knock at the Cabin
casting: Dave Bautista, Jonathan Groff, Ben Aldridge

synopsis:
Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken
its toll when he learns that he has burnt through eight of his
nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical
Last Wish and restore his nine lives.
title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
casting: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Harvey Guillén

synopsis:
Ant-Man and the Wasp find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm,
interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure
that pushes them beyond the limits of what they thought was
possible.
title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
casting: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Douglas

synopsis:
Jake Sully and Ney'tiri have formed a family and are doing everything
to stay together. However, they must leave their home and explore the
regions of Pandora. When an ancient threat resurfaces, Jake must
fight a difficult war against the humans.
title: Avatar: The Way of the Water
trailerPicture: images/movie/avatar the way of the water.jpg
casting: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

synopsis:
When a lively young family moves in next door, grumpy widower Otto
Anderson meets his match in a quick-witted, pregnant woman named
Marisol, leading to an unlikely friendship that turns his world
upside down.
title: A Man Called Otto
casting: Tom Hanks, Mariana Treviño, Rachel Keller

synopsis:
M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll
that's programmed to be a child's greatest companion and a parent's
greatest ally. Designed by Gemma, a brilliant roboticist, M3GAN can
listen, watch and learn as it plays the role of friend and teacher,
playmate and protector. When Gemma becomes the unexpected caretaker
of her 8-year-old niece, she decides to give the girl an M3GAN
prototype, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.
title: M3GAN
casting: Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Ronny Chieng

synopsis:
An Indian spy battles against the leader of a gang of mercenaries
who have a heinous plot for his homeland.
title: Pathaan
casting: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham

synopsis:
Mike Lane takes to the stage once again when a business deal
that went bust leaves him broke and bartending in Florida. Hoping
for one last hurrah, Mike heads to London with a wealthy socialite
who lures him with an offer he can't refuse -- and an agenda all
her own. With everything on the line, he soon finds himself trying
to whip a hot new roster of talented dancers into shape.
title: Magic Mike's Last Dance
casting: Channing Tatum, Salma Hayek, Ayub Khan-Din

synopsis:
The youngest of King Triton's daughters, Ariel is a beautiful
and spirited young mermaid with a thirst for adventure. Longing
to find out more about the world beyond the sea, Ariel visits the
surface and falls for the dashing Prince Eric. Following her heart,
she makes a deal with the evil sea witch, Ursula, to experience
life on land.
title: The Little Mermaid
casting: Halle Bailey, Jonah Hauer-King, Melissa McCarthy

synopsis:
While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl
and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who
demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse.
Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world,
the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.
title: Luther: The Fallen Sun
casting: Idras Elba, Cynthia Erivo, Andy Serkis

synopsis:
The story focuses on a young Willy Wonka and how he met the
Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.
title: Wonka
casting: Timothée Chalamet, Olivia Colman, Sally Hawkins

synopsis:
A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth
with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.
title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
casting: Chris Pratt, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day, Jack Black

synopsis:
Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his
team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that
could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.
title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
casting: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista

synopsis:
After being expelled from Barbieland for being a less than
perfect-looking doll, Barbie sets off for the human world to find
true happiness.
title: Barbie
casting: Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling, Ariana Greenblatt

synopsis:
A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with
unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is
incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical
practices.
title: The Portable Door
casting: Patrick Gibson, Christoph Waltz, Sam Neill

title: Blue Beetle
casting: Susan Sarandon: Harvey Guillén: Raoul Max Tujillo
